solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public int maxSubArray(int[] A) {--newline--            int n = A.length;--newline--            int[] dp = new int[n];//dp[i] means the maximum subarray ending with A[i];--newline--            dp[0] = A[0];--newline--            int max = dp[0];--newline--            --newline--            for(int i = 1; i < n; i++){--newline--                dp[i] = A[i] + (dp[i - 1] > 0 ? dp[i - 1] : 0);--newline--                max = Math.max(max, dp[i]);--newline--            }--newline--            --newline--            return max;--newline--    }--newline--}
